edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.cryptopp

Class CryptoPpSHA1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.cryptopp.CryptoPpHash
      • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.hash.cryptopp.CryptoPpSHA1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CryptographicHash, SHA1, CollisionResistant, HashSecLevel, SecurityLevel, TargetCollisionResistant

    public final class CryptoPpSHA1
extends CryptoPpHash
implements SHA1
    Concrete class of cryptographicHash for SHA1. This class wraps crypto++ implementation of SHA1.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Meital Levy)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CryptoPpSHA1()
      Passes the hash name to the super class which does the hash computation
